translations: 时髦的，赶时髦的（trendy 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: The trendiest kind of pet these dasys is the pot-bellied pig.
sentences.translation: 目前，最时髦的宠物是大肚猪。

sentences.sentence: The trendiest kind of pet these days is the pot—bellied pig.
sentences.translation: 当今最时髦的一种宠物是大肚猪。

sentences.sentence: One of the trendiest trend-watchers is called trendwatching.com.
sentences.translation: 一家极为时髦的趋势预测机构叫“trendwatching.com”。
